section.title: Debian Linux
section.para:
Find the latest executable version of crystal-facet-uml at:
sudo apt edit-sources # add deb http://deb.debian.org/debian/ bullseye main sudo apt install crystal-facet-uml
If you instead manually downloaded the .deb archive, you may e.g. invoke sudo dpkg --install <filename.deb>

section.title: SuSE Linux
section.para:
Check which distro version fits best to your Linux installation; replace openSUSE_Leap_15.1 accordingly.
sudo zypper addrepo https://download.opensuse.org/repositories/devel:/tools/openSUSE_Leap_15.1/devel:tools.repo sudo zypper install crystal-facet-uml

section.title: Wine/Windows
section.para: Find the latest executable version of crystal-facet-uml at:

Unpack the zip archive.
On windows, doubleclick on crystal-facet-uml.bat,
or using the wine emulation, call cd bin && wine crystal-facet-uml.exe to start.
